Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav played a match-winning knock of 112 not out off 51 balls to power India to a 91-run win over Sri Lanka in the third and final T20I.
India clinched the three-match series 2-1 against Sri Lanka.
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya lauded Suryakumar Yadav in the post-match presentation ceremony, stating that he has been surprising everyone and making batting look very easy.
Hardik Pandya expressed that as a bowler, he would be disheartened with the shots Suryakumar Yadav plays.
